revision.comment: SoC does not in fact have Ethernet capability! Ethernet is implemented via PCIe interface.
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=SimpleWAN |model=Advanced |revision=(SW301DA-NA) |manuf_country=Switzerland |is_manuf=No |manuf=PC Engines |manuf_model=apu.1d |type=Router Firewall |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model=GET40E;GET40EFSB22GV; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |fla2=8 GiB |fla2_brand=SanDisk |fla2_model=SD Card |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83FFR-PBC |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, mPCIe, mSATA, SATA |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8111E |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8111E |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8111E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Super I/O Chipset;Nuvoton;NCT5104D;;1;,,, Fusion Controller Hub;AMD;218-0792006;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;On Semi;74VHCT00A;;1;,,, CPU Power Supply Controller;O2Micro;OZ8380ALN;;1;,,, Integrated Power Supply Controller;O2Micro;OZ812;;1;,,, Step-Down PWM Controller w/ PFM;Anpec;APW7199;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5930;;1;,,, 3A Synchronous Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega;AOZ1022DI;;2;,,, Hex Inverter Buffer/Driver w/Open-Drain Input;TI;SN75LVC06A;;1;,,, 1A Dual Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2172A;;2;,,, 30V Dual Asymmetric N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7932;;6;,,, Dual Ultra High Efficiency DC/DC w/ 5V Regulator & Switch-Over;O2Micro;OZ8153LN;;1;,,, USB 2.0 SD/MMC/MS Single-LUN Card Reader Controller;Alcor Micro;AU6465R;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, SIM Card slot, SD Card slot, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=PC Engines APU BIOS;Sep 8 2014; |stock_os=FreeBSD |oui_eth=00:0D:B9 }} {{TagLine|SimpleWAN Advanced}} :[https://support.simplewan.com/portal/en/kb/articles/setting-up-your-unit SetUp Guide] [https://www.pcengines.ch/apu1c.htm OEM Info]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[AMD]] G series T40E @1.0GHz Dual-core 64bit X86 *Storage: 2MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card, mSATA, SATA *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 host port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe slots *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
